name: @sendo-labs/plugin-sendo-worker
description: Sendo Worker plugin for ElizaOS - provides worker task management and execution

scripts.test:unit: bun test --bail src/__tests__/unit/categorize-actions.test.ts && bun test --bail src/__tests__/unit/collect-provider-data.test.ts && bun test --bail src/__tests__/unit/execute-analysis-actions.test.ts && bun test --bail src/__tests__/unit/select-relevant-data-actions.test.ts && bun test --bail src/__tests__/unit/generate-analysis.test.ts && bun test --bail src/__tests__/unit/generate-recommendations.test.ts && bun test --bail src/__tests__/unit/save-analysis.test.ts && bun test --bail src/__tests__/unit/process-decisions.test.ts && bun test --bail src/__tests__/unit/db-getters.test.ts
scripts.test:all: bun run test:unit && bun run test:integration
